summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the West Seattle Freeway; making an appropriation from the West Seattle Freeway Fund for the demolition and removal of the existing north bascule bridge and approach structures over the West Waterway of the Duwamish River and the Construction of the substructure and super-structure of the West Waterway mainspan crossing over the Duwamish River; authorizing the execution of agreements and the hiring of consultants in connection therewith.
